annotations.description: It's the season for Mulled Wine and this recipe for it comes from Charles Dickens, it's called Smoking Bishop and it is delicious and easy to make! Charles D...
annotations.title: Christmas Punch recipe by Charles Dickens | How to Drink

textContent:
4 Oranges studded with cloves
25.46 oz. -or- 750 ml. Bordeaux Wine
24.46 oz. -or- 750 ml. Ruby port
1/4 Tsp fresh ginger (more if you like!)
1/4 Tsp fresh Nutmeg (more if you like!)
1/4 Tsp all-spice (more if you like!)
1/2 cup -or- 106 g brown sugar
Orange wheels studded with cloves for garnish. 

Baked studded oranges at 350Âºf 60-90 minutes 
Set oranges aside
Heat other ingredients to a simmer
Add juice of cooked oranges
Garnish bowl with clove studded orange wheels

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qJJvIbKo1DI
title: Smoking Bishop
